title: Biden Parties, Americans Suffer
itunes:title: Biden Parties, Americans Suffer
description: Yesterday, when President Biden reported a massive inflation surge over last year, the stock market reacted by having its worst day since the pandemic lockdown. So Biden drops a proverbial bomb on the economy and hurts millions of Americans struggling to get by, then he goes to a party? Jay, Logan, and the Sekulow team discuss the massive problems facing America's economy and the optics of Biden having a party right after breaking terrible news for American consumers. This and more today on Sekulow.
